tables = $('table.stickyHeader');\n\ttables.each(function(i){\n\t\tvar table = tables[i];\n\t\tvar tableClone = $(table).clone(true).empty().removeClass('stickyHeader');\n\t\tvar theadClone = $(table).find('thead').clone(true);\n\t\tvar stickyHeader =  $('<div></div>').addClass('stickyHeader hide').attr('aria-hidden', 'true');\n\t\tstickyHeader.append(tableClone).find('table').append(theadClone);\n\t\t$(table).after(stickyHeader);\n\t\tvar tableHeight = $(table).height();\n\t\tvar tableWidth = $(table).width() + Number($(table).css('padding-left').replace(/px/ig,\"\")) + Number($(table).css('padding-right').replace(/px/ig,\"\")) + Number($(table).css('border-left-width').replace(/px/ig,\"\")) + Number($(table).css('border-right-width').replace(/px/ig,\"\"));\n\t\tvar headerCells = $(table).find('thead th');\n\t\tvar headerCellHeight = $(headerCells[0]).height();\n\t\tvar no_fixed_support = false;\n\t\tif (stickyHeader.css('position') == \"absolute\") {\n\t\t\tno_fixed_support = true;\n\t\t}\n\t\tvar stickyHeaderCells = stickyHeader.find('th');\n\t\tstickyHeader.css('width', tableWidth);\n\t\tvar cellWidths = [];\n\t\tfor (var i = 0, l = headerCells.length; i < l; i++) {\n\t\t\tcellWidths[i] = $(headerCells[i]).width();\n\t\t}\n\t\tfor (var i = 0, l = headerCells.length; i < l; i++) {\n\t\t\t$(stickyHeaderCells[i]).css('width', cellWidths[i]);\n\t\t}\n\t\tvar cutoffTop = $(table).offset().top;\n\t\tvar cutoffBottom = tableHeight + cutoffTop - headerCellHeight;\n\t\t$(window).scroll(function() { \n\t\tvar currentPosition = $(window).scrollTop();\n\t\t\tif (currentPosition > cutoffTop && currentPosition < cutoffBottom) {\n\t\t\t\tstickyHeader.removeClass('hide');\n\t\t\t\tif (no_fixed_support) {\n\t\t\t\t\tstickyHeader.css('top', currentPosition + 'px');\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\telse {\n\t\t\t\tstickyHeader.addClass('hide');\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t});\n\t});\n});\n//jquery.total-storage.min.js\n(function(c,h){var e,d;if(\"localStorage\"in window)try{d=\"undefined\"===typeof window.localStorage?h:window.localStorage,e=\"undefined\"==typeof d||\"undefined\"==typeof window.JSON?!1:!0}catch(j){e=!1}c.totalStorage=function(b,a){return c.totalStorage.impl.init(b,a)};c.totalStorage.setItem=function(b,a){return c.totalStorage.impl.setItem(b,a)};c.totalStorage.getItem=function(b){return c.totalStorage.impl.getItem(b)};c.totalStorage.getAll=function(){return c.totalStorage.impl.getAll()};c.totalStorage.deleteItem=\nfunction(b){return c.totalStorage.impl.deleteItem(b)};c.totalStorage.impl={init:function(b,a){return\"undefined\"!=typeof a?this.setItem(b,a):this.getItem(b)},setItem:function(b,a){if(!e)try{return c.cookie(b,a),a}catch(g){console.log(\"Local Storage not supported by this browser. Install the cookie plugin on your site to take advantage of the same functionality. You can get it at https://github.com/carhartl/jquery-cookie\")}var f=JSON.stringify(a);d.setItem(b,f);return this.parseResult(f)},getItem:function(b){if(!e)try{return this.parseResult(c.cookie(b))}catch(a){return null}b=\nd.getItem(b);return this.parseResult(b)},deleteItem:function(b){if(!e)try{return c.cookie(b,null),!0}catch(a){return!1}d.removeItem(b);return!0},getAll:function(){var b=[];if(e)for(var a in d)a.length&&b.push({key:a,value:this.parseResult(d.getItem(a))});else try{var g=document.cookie.split(\";\");for(a=0;a<g.length;a++){var f=g[a].split(\"=\")[0];b.push({key:f,value:this.parseResult(c.cookie(f))})}}catch(h){return null}return b},parseResult:function(b){var a;try{a=JSON.parse(b),\"undefined\"==typeof a&&\n(a=b),\"true\"==a&&(a=!0),\"false\"==a&&(a=!1),parseFloat(a)==a&&\"object\"!=typeof a&&(a=parseFloat(a))}catch(c){a=b}return a}}})(jQuery);\n//jquery.cookie.js\njQuery.cookie = function (key, value, options) {\n\t// key and value given, set cookie...\n    if (arguments.length > 1 && (value === null || typeof value !== \"object\")) {\n        options = jQuery.extend({}, options);\n\t\tif (value === null) {\n            options.expires = -1;\n        }\n\t\tif (typeof options.expires === 'number') {\n            var days = options.expires, t = options.expires = new Date();\n            t.setDate(t.getDate() + days);\n        }\n\t\treturn (document.cookie = [\n            encodeURIComponent(key), '=',\n            options.raw ? String(value) : encodeURIComponent(String(value)),\n            options.expires ? '; expires=' + options.expires.toUTCString() : '', // use expires attribute, max-age is not supported by IE\n            options.path ? '; path=' + options.path : '',\n            options.domain ? '; domain=' + options.domain : '',\n            options.secure ? '; secure' : ''\n        ].join(''));\n    }\n\t// key and possibly options given, get cookie...\n    options = value || {};\n    var result, decode = options.raw ? function (s) { return s; } : decodeURIComponent;\n    return (result = new RegExp('(?:^|; )' + encodeURIComponent(key) + '=([^;]*)').exec(document.cookie)) ? decode(result[1]) : null;\n};\n//tabs.js\n$.fn.tabs = function() {\n\tvar selector = this;\n\tthis.each(function() {\n\t\tvar obj = $(this); \n\t\t$(obj.attr('href')).hide();\n\t\t$(obj).click(function() {\n\t\t\t$(selector).removeClass('selected');\n\t\t\t$(selector).each(function(i, element) {\n\t\t\t\t$($(element).attr('href')).hide();\n\t\t\t});\n\t\t\t$(this).addClass('selected');\n\t\t\t$($(this).attr('href')).fadeIn();\n\t\t\treturn false;\n\t\t});\n\t});\n\t$(this).first().click();\n};\n// fadeSlideShow\njQuery.fn.fadeSlideShow=function(options){return this.each(function(){settings=jQuery.extend({width:640,height:480,speed:'slow',interval:3000,PlayPauseElement:'fssPlayPause',PlayText:'Play',PauseText:'Pause',NextElement:'fssNext',NextElementText:'Next >',PrevElement:'fssPrev',PrevElementText:'< Prev',ListElement:'fssList',ListLi:'fssLi',ListLiActive:'fssActive',addListToId:false,allowKeyboardCtrl:true,autoplay:true},options);jQuery(this).css({width:settings.width,height:settings.height,position:'relative',overflow:'hidden'});jQuery('> *',this).css({position:'absolute',width:settings.width,height:settings.height});Slides=jQuery('> *',this).length;Slides=Slides-1;ActSlide=Slides;jQslide=jQuery('> *',this);fssThis=this;autoplay=function(){intval=setInterval(function(){jQslide.eq(ActSlide).fadeOut(settings.speed);if(settings.ListElement){setActLi=(Slides-ActSlide)+1;if(setActLi>Slides){setActLi=0;}\njQuery('#'+settings.ListElement+' li').removeClass(settings.ListLiActive);jQuery('#'+settings.ListElement+' li').eq(setActLi).addClass(settings.ListLiActive);}\nif(ActSlide<=0){jQslide.fadeIn(settings.speed);ActSlide=Slides;}else{ActSlide=ActSlide-1;}},settings.interval);if(settings.PlayPauseElement){jQuery('#'+settings.PlayPauseElement).html(settings.PauseText);}}\nstopAutoplay=function(){clearInterval(intval);intval=false;if(settings.PlayPauseElement){jQuery('#'+settings.PlayPauseElement).html(settings.PlayText);}}\njumpTo=function(newIndex){if(newIndex<0){newIndex=Slides;}\nelse if(newIndex>Slides){newIndex=0;}\nif(newIndex>=ActSlide){jQuery('> *:lt('+(newIndex+1)+')',fssThis).fadeIn(settings.speed);}else if(newIndex<=ActSlide){jQuery('> *:gt('+newIndex+')',fssThis).fadeOut(settings.speed);}\nActSlide=newIndex;if(settings.ListElement){jQuery('#'+settings.ListElement+' li').removeClass(settings.ListLiActive);jQuery('#'+settings.ListElement+' li').eq((Slides-newIndex)).addClass(settings.ListLiActive);}}\nif(settings.ListElement){i=0;li='';while(i<=Slides){if(i==0){li=li+'<li class=\"'+settings.ListLi+i+' '+settings.ListLiActive+'\"><a href=\"#\">'+(i+1)+'<\\/a><\\/li>';}else{li=li+'<li class=\"'+settings.ListLi+i+'\"><a href=\"#\">'+(i+1)+'<\\/a><\\/li>';}\ni++;}\nList='<ul id=\"'+settings.ListElement+'\">'+li+'<\\/ul>';if(settings.addListToId){jQuery('#'+settings.addListToId).append(List);}else{jQuery(this).after(List);}\njQuery('#'+settings.ListElement+' a').bind('click',function(){index=jQuery('#'+settings.ListElement+' a').index(this);stopAutoplay();ReverseIndex=Slides-index;jumpTo(ReverseIndex);return false;});}\nif(settings.PlayPauseElement){if(!jQuery('#'+settings.PlayPauseElement).css('display')){jQuery(this).after('<a href=\"#\" id=\"'+settings.PlayPauseElement+'\"><\\/a>');}\nif(settings.autoplay){jQuery('#'+settings.PlayPauseElement).html(settings.PauseText);}else{jQuery('#'+settings.PlayPauseElement).html(settings.PlayText);}\njQuery('#'+settings.PlayPauseElement).bind('click',function(){if(intval){stopAutoplay();}else{autoplay();}\nreturn false;});}\nif(settings.NextElement){if(!jQuery('#'+settings.NextElement).css('display')){jQuery(this).after('<a href=\"#\" id=\"'+settings.NextElement+'\">'+settings.NextElementText+'<\\/a>');}\njQuery('#'+settings.NextElement).bind('click',function(){nextSlide=ActSlide-1;stopAutoplay();jumpTo(nextSlide);return false;});}\nif(settings.PrevElement){if(!jQuery('#'+settings.PrevElement).css('display')){jQuery(this).after('<a href=\"#\" id=\"'+settings.PrevElement+'\">'+settings.PrevElementText+'<\\/a>');}\njQuery('#'+settings.PrevElement).bind('click',function(){prevSlide=ActSlide+1;stopAutoplay();jumpTo(prevSlide);return false;});}\nif(settings.allowKeyboardCtrl){jQuery(document).bind('keydown',function(e){if(e.which==39){nextSlide=ActSlide-1;stopAutoplay();jumpTo(nextSlide);}else if(e.which==37){prevSlide=ActSlide+1;stopAutoplay();jumpTo(prevSlide);}else if(e.which==32){if(intval){stopAutoplay();}\nelse{autoplay();}\nreturn false;}});}\nif(settings.autoplay){autoplay();}else{intval=false;}});};\n// carousels.js\n$(function(){\n  // vars for testimonials carousel\n  var $txtcarousel = $('#testimonial-list');\n  var txtcount = $txtcarousel.children().length;\n  var wrapwidth = (txtcount * 415) + 415; // 400px width for each testimonial item\n  $txtcarousel.css('width',wrapwidth);\n  var animtime = 750; // milliseconds for clients carousel \n  // prev & next btns for testimonials\n  $('#prv-testimonial').on('click', function(){\n    var $last = $('#testimonial-list li:last');\n    $last.remove().css({ 'margin-left': '-415px' });\n    $('#testimonial-list li:first').before($last);\n    $last.animate({ 'margin-left': '0px' }, animtime); \n  });  \n  $('#nxt-testimonial').on('click', function(){\n    var $first = $('#testimonial-list li:first');\n    $first.animate({ 'margin-left': '-415px' }, animtime, function() {\n      $first.remove().css({ 'margin-left': '0px' });\n      $('#testimonial-list li:last').after($first);\n    });  \n  });\n  var clientspeed = 10000;\n  var tt= setInterval (har_carousel, clientspeed);\n  function har_carousel(){ $('#nxt-testimonial').click(); }\n});\n\n\n$(document).ready(function(){\n\t/* */\n\t\t$(\"#tocont\").append($(\"#trackorder\").html());\n\t\t$(\".trackorder > a\").click(function(){\n\t\t\t$(\"#tocont\").fadeIn();\n\t\t\treturn false;\n\t\t})\n\t\t$(\".toptrack\").click(function(){\n\t\t\t$(\"#tocont\").fadeIn();\n\t\t\treturn false;\n\t\t})\n\t\t$(\"#tocont .toclose\").click(function(){\n\t\t\t$(\"#tocont\").hide();\n\t\t\treturn false;\n\t\t})\n\t\n\t// Footer newsletter text change\n\tif ($(window).width() < 768) {\n    \t$(\".footer-up.newslettercont > span\").text(\"Newsletter Subscription\");\n\t} else {\t}\n\t\n\t$(\"#myaccount\").click(function(){\n\t\t$(\"#myaccount_dropdown\").slideToggle();\n\t})\n\t$(\"#search_main > img\").click(function(){\n\t\t$(\"#search\").slideToggle();\n\t});\n\t$(\".topsearch\").click(function(){\n\t\t$(\"#search\").css(\"display\",\"block\");\n\t\t//$(\"#search_main\").css(\"display\",\"block\");\n\t\t$(\"#search_main\").slideToggle();\n\t});\t\n})\n\n$(document).ready(function(){\n\tvar progress = null;\n\t$(\"input[name='search']\").click(function(){\n\t\t$('.search-result').html(''); $('.search-result').hide(); \n\t})\n\t$(\"input[name='search']\").keyup(function(){\n  \t  $('.search-result').hide();\n\t  if($(\"input[name='search']\").val().length<2) {$('.search-result').html(''); $('.search-result').hide(); return;};\n\t  \n\t\tif (progress) {\n\t\t\tprogress.abort();\n\t\t}// abort any previous request.\n\t\t// empty search results div and show loader image.\n\t\t$('.search-result').html('<img src=\"//www.giftsbymeeta.com/image/autocomplete-loader3.gif\" width=\"16\" height=\"16\" style=\"margin-left:10px; margin-top:10px; margin-bottom:10px; \" /> &nbsp; Loading...').show();\n\t\t\n\t\tprogress = i=0;i<json.length;i++){\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tresult+=\"<li class='sitem'>\";\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tresult+=\"<a href='\"+json[i].href+\"'><img class='simg' src='\"+json[i].thumb+\"'/><span class='sname'>\"+json[i].name+\"</a>\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tresult+=\"</li>\";\n\t\t\t\t\t\t  }\n\t\t\t\t\t\t  result+=\"</ul>\";\n\t\t\t\t\t\t  $('.search-result').html(result);\n\t\t\t\t\t\t  $('.search-result').show();\n\t\t\t\t\t\t  progress = null;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}else{\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$('.search-result').html('<p>&nbsp; No results found.</p>').show();\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t  }) // end $.ajax\n\t\t})\n\t}); .topcart a, .topbrands a, .topsearch .toptxt, .topaccount .toptxt, .toptrack .toptxt, .topcart .toptxt, .topbrands .toptxt{margin-right:1px !important; font-size: 9px!important;}\n\t.brandlogo{background:none; height:0;}\n\t#search_main{right:1%!important; top: 95%; margin-top:10px!important;}\n\t#cart{left:5%!important; right:5%!important; margin:auto; top:auto!important; z-index:99999; }\n\t#mobileMenuWrapper{display:block;}\n}/*  media query */\n\n@media type=\"text/javascript\"><!--\n//$('select[name=\\'zone_id\\']').load('index.php?route=account/register/zone&country_id=99&zone_id=');\n//--></script> \n<script type=\"text/javascript\"><!--\n$('.fancybox').fancybox({\n\twidth: 560,\n\theight: 560,\n\tautoDimensions: false\n});\n//-->\n$('select[name=\\'country_id\\']').bind('change', function() {\n        complete: function() {\n            $('.wait').remove();\n        },          \n        success: function(json) {\n            if (json['postcode_required'] == '1') {\n                $('#postcode-required').show();\n            } else {\n                $('#postcode-required').hide();\n            }\n\n            html = '<option value=\"\"> --- Please Select --- </option>';\n\n            if (json['zone'] != '') {\n                for (i = 0; i < json['zone'].length; i++) {\n                    html += '<option value=\"' + json['zone'][i]['zone_id'] + '\"';\n\n '</option>';\n                }\n            } else {\n                html += '<option value=\"0\" selected=\"selected\"> --- None --- </option>';\n            }\n\n xhr.responseText);\n        }\n    });\n});\n\n$('select[name=\\'country_id\\']').trigger('change');\n</script>\n\n\n  <script type=\"text/javascript\"><!--\n  $('#module_login 'index.php?route=module/newslettersubscribe/subscribe',\n\n\t\t\tdataType: 'html',\n\n            data:$(\"#subscribe\").serialize(),\n\n\t\t\tsuccess: function (html) {\n\n\t\t\t\teval(html);\n\n\t\t\t}}); \n\n\t\n}\n\n\n\n\n\n$(document).ready(function(){\n\n$('#subscribe').bind(\"keyup\", function(e) {\n\n\t  var code = e.keyCode || e.which; \n\n\t  if (code  == 13) {   \n\n\t    email_subscribe();\n\n\t    e.preventDefault();\n\n\t    return false;\n\n\t  }\n\n\t});\n\n\n\n\n\n})\n\n\n\nfunction email_unsubscribe(){\n\n\t\n\t$.ajax({\n\n\t\t\ttype: 'post',\n\n\t\t\turl: 'index.php?route=module/newslettersubscribe/unsubscribe',\n\n\t\t\tdataType: 'html',\n\n            data:$(\"#subscribe\").serialize(),\n\n\t\t\tsuccess: function (html) {\n\n\t\t\t\teval(html);\n\n\t\t\t}}); \n\n\t\n}\n\n   \n   \n\n\n\n\nfunction subscribe_mailing_list() {\n\n selected_ml=\"\";$('#subscribe input[type=checkbox]').each(function(){ \n\n }\n\n});alert(\"Thanks for signing up for \" + selected_ml+\".\");\n\n}\n\n</script>\n\n</div>\n\n\n\n</div>\n            \n      <div class=\"productFooter-social\" style=\"display:none;\"> \n    autoSize  : false,\n    openEffect  : 'fade',\n    closeEffect : 'fade'\n  });\n$('.social_signin').html($('.box-advancedlogin .box-content').html());\n$('.box-advancedlogin').remove();\n</script> \n<!--FOOTER--> \n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n\n$(document).ready(function(){\n\t//========================\n\t$(\".mobile-menu\").click(function(){\n\t\t$(\".menu.mega-slide\").slideToggle();\t\n\t\t$('.lgray > h2\").click(function(){\n\t\t$(\".footer-t-col ul ~ .footer_open\").slideUp('slow', function(){\n\t\t  $(this).prev().removeClass(\"minussign\");  \n\t\t});\n\t\t$(this).removeClass(\"minussign\"); Script-->\n//$(document).ready(function(){\n$(window).load(function() {\n\twindow.$zopim||(function(d,s){var Mobile Menu ............. \n    <!-- \n\t<script src=\"js/jquery.min.js\"></script>\n    <script src=\"/mob/jquery.easing.1.3.js\"></script>\n    <script src=\"/mob/mobileMenu.js\"></script>\n\t-->\n\t<script language=\"javascript\"> \n\t//jquery easing 1.3.js\n\tjQuery.easing.jswing=jQuery.easing.swing;jQuery.extend(jQuery.easing,{def:\"easeOutQuad\",swing:function(e,f,a,h,g){return jQuery.easing[jQuery.easing.def](e,f,a,h,g)},easeInQuad:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*(f/=g)*f+a},easeOutQuad:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h*(f/=g)*(f-2)+a},easeInOutQuad:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*f*f+a}return -h/2*((--f)*(f-2)-1)+a},easeInCubic:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*(f/=g)*f*f+a},easeOutCubic:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*((f=f/g-1)*f*f+1)+a},easeInOutCubic:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*f*f*f+a}return h/2*((f-=2)*f*f+2)+a},easeInQuart:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*(f/=g)*f*f*f+a},easeOutQuart:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h*((f=f/g-1)*f*f*f-1)+a},easeInOutQuart:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*f*f*f*f+a}return -h/2*((f-=2)*f*f*f-2)+a},easeInQuint:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*(f/=g)*f*f*f*f+a},easeOutQuint:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*((f=f/g-1)*f*f*f*f+1)+a},easeInOutQuint:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*f*f*f*f*f+a}return h/2*((f-=2)*f*f*f*f+2)+a},easeInSine:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h*Math.cos(f/g*(Math.PI/2))+h+a},easeOutSine:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*Math.sin(f/g*(Math.PI/2))+a},easeInOutSine:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h/2*(Math.cos(Math.PI*f/g)-1)+a},easeInExpo:function(e,f,a,h,g){return(f==0)?a:h*Math.pow(2,10*(f/g-1))+a},easeOutExpo:function(e,f,a,h,g){return(f==g)?a+h:h*(-Math.pow(2,-10*f/g)+1)+a},easeInOutExpo:function(e,f,a,h,g){if(f==0){return a}if(f==g){return a+h}if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*Math.pow(2,10*(f-1))+a}return h/2*(-Math.pow(2,-10*--f)+2)+a},easeInCirc:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h*(Math.sqrt(1-(f/=g)*f)-1)+a},easeOutCirc:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*Math.sqrt(1-(f=f/g-1)*f)+a},easeInOutCirc:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return -h/2*(Math.sqrt(1-f*f)-1)+a}return h/2*(Math.sqrt(1-(f-=2)*f)+1)+a},easeInElastic:function(f,h,e,l,k){var i=1.70158;var j=0;var g=l;if(h==0){return e}if((h/=k)==1){return e+l}if(!j){j=k*0.3}if(g<Math.abs(l)){g=l;var i=j/4}else{var i=j/(2*Math.PI)*Math.asin(l/g)}return -(g*Math.pow(2,10*(h-=1))*Math.sin((h*k-i)*(2*Math.PI)/j))+e},easeOutElastic:function(f,h,e,l,k){var i=1.70158;var j=0;var g=l;if(h==0){return e}if((h/=k)==1){return e+l}if(!j){j=k*0.3}if(g<Math.abs(l)){g=l;var i=j/4}else{var i=j/(2*Math.PI)*Math.asin(l/g)}return g*Math.pow(2,-10*h)*Math.sin((h*k-i)*(2*Math.PI)/j)+l+e},easeInOutElastic:function(f,h,e,l,k){var i=1.70158;var j=0;var g=l;if(h==0){return e}if((h/=k/2)==2){return e+l}if(!j){j=k*(0.3*1.5)}if(g<Math.abs(l)){g=l;var i=j/4}else{var i=j/(2*Math.PI)*Math.asin(l/g)}if(h<1){return -0.5*(g*Math.pow(2,10*(h-=1))*Math.sin((h*k-i)*(2*Math.PI)/j))+e}return g*Math.pow(2,-10*(h-=1))*Math.sin((h*k-i)*(2*Math.PI)/j)*0.5+l+e},easeInBack:function(e,f,a,i,h,g){if(g==undefined){g=1.70158}return i*(f/=h)*f*((g+1)*f-g)+a},easeOutBack:function(e,f,a,i,h,g){if(g==undefined){g=1.70158}return i*((f=f/h-1)*f*((g+1)*f+g)+1)+a},easeInOutBack:function(e,f,a,i,h,g){if(g==undefined){g=1.70158}if((f/=h/2)<1){return i/2*(f*f*(((g*=(1.525))+1)*f-g))+a}return i/2*((f-=2)*f*(((g*=(1.525))+1)*f+g)+2)+a},easeInBounce:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h-jQuery.easing.easeOutBounce(e,g-f,0,h,g)+a},easeOutBounce:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g)<(1/2.75)){return h*(7.5625*f*f)+a}else{if(f<(2/2.75)){return h*(7.5625*(f-=(1.5/2.75))*f+0.75)+a}else{if(f<(2.5/2.75)){return h*(7.5625*(f-=(2.25/2.75))*f+0.9375)+a}else{return h*(7.5625*(f-=(2.625/2.75))*f+0.984375)+a}}}},easeInOutBounce:function(e,f,a,h,g){if(f<g/2){return jQuery.easing.easeInBounce(e,f*2,0,h,g)*0.5+a}return jQuery.easing.easeOutBounce(e,f*2-g,0,h,g)*0.5+h*0.5+a}});\n\t\n\t//Mobile Menu js\n\t\"use strict\";!function(e){e.fn.mobileMenu=function(n,i){function t(n,i){var a=n.items,o=void 0!==i,r=p(o),m=d(i,r),y=s(n.title);r.append(y),o&&r.append(m);var k=u(r);w.closeStatic?(k.addClass(\"static\"),r.addClass(\"closeStatic\"),1===b&&e(\"#mobileMenuWrapper\").append(k)):r.prepend(k),l(o,r),e.each(a,function(e,i){var a=v().item;\"section\"in i?a.addClass(\"more\"):i.url&&c(a,i.url),a.append(i.name),r.append(a),a.on(\"click\",function(e){if(\"section\"in i){g++;var a=n.title;t(i.section,a)}})}),o||(\"top\"===w.openFrom?h.css(\"top\",f().height*-1):h.css(\"left\",f().width*-1))}function a(){for(var n=v().open,i=0;i<3;i++){var t=v().line;n.append(t)}return e(\"#mobileMenuWrapper\").append(n),n}function o(){\".mobileMenuOpener\"===w.opener&&a();var n=w.animation,i=\"top\"===w.openFrom?{top:0}:{left:0};e(w.opener).on(\"click\",function(t){h.css(\"display\",\"inline-block\"),e(this).animate({opacity:0},n.speed,function(){e(this).css(\"display\",\"none\")}),e(\".close\").css(\"display\",\"block\"),e(\".close\").animate({opacity:1},n.speed),h.animate(i,n.speed,n.easing)})}function s(e){var n=v().title;return n.append(e),n}function c(e,n){e.on(\"click\",function(){window.location.href=n})}function p(e){var n=v().page;return n.css(\"height\",f().height),e&&n.css(\"left\",f().width),h.append(n),n}function l(e,n){if(e){var i=w.animation;n.animate({left:0},i.speed,i.easing)}}function d(e,n){var i=v().btn;return i.append(\"< \"+e),i.on(\"click\",function(e){r(n)}),i}function r(e){var n=w.animation;e.animate({left:f().width},n.speed,n.easing,function(){e.remove()})}function u(n){var i=v().close,t=w.animation;return i.on(\"click\",function(n){if(w.closeAll)for(var a=1;a<g;a++){var o=e(\".page\").not(e(\".page\").eq(0));r(o)}i.animate({opacity:0},.2*t.speed,function(){i.css(\"display\",\"none\")}),h.animate({left:f().width*-1},t.speed,t.easing,function(){h.css(\"display\",\"none\"),e(w.opener).css(\"display\",\"block\"),e(w.opener).animate({opacity:1},t.speed)})}),b++,i}function f(){return{height:e(document).height(),width:e(document).width()}}function v(){var n=w.shadow?\"page shadow\":\"page\";return{page:e('<div class=\"'+n+'\"></div>'),item:e('<div class=\"item\"></div>'),btn:e('<div class=\"button back\"></div>'),close:e('<div class=\"button close\"></div>'),open:e('<div class=\"mobileMenuOpener\"></div>'),line:e('<div class=\"line\"></div>'),title:e('<div class=\"title\"></div>')}}var function(e){\n          $('span', '.stylesToggle').removeClass('selected');\n          currentCss = styles.indexOf(currentCss) == 0 ? styles[1] : styles[0];\n          $(this).html(currentCss);\n
